data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Anenii Noi, Moldova so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Anenii Noi, Moldova
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Anenii Noi to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.section_summary: On average, 9 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Anenii Noi, Moldova.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Anenii Noi, Moldova who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 79,000 people living in Anenii Noi, Moldova. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Father, help the 3,648 believers in Anenii Noi to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Father, let knowledge and depth of insight abound more and more in the church of Anenii Noi, Moldova.
data.verse: And this is my prayer: that your love may abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight,

data.prayer: Spirit, inspire new kinds of evangelism through social media in Anenii Noi, Moldova.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist, discharge all the duties of your ministry.
